column1: Can anyone please recommend a good Amsterdam news website with an English version? I tried Google and couldn't find any helpful websites. Thanks
https://www.dutchnews.nl/https://dutchreview.com/https://nltimes.nl/https://www.telegraph.co.uk/netherlands/"Not all those who wander are lost.” ― J.R.R. Tolkien
If you're looking for local Amsterdam news the parool has a (fairly limited) number of articles in English.https://www.parool.nl/english
Instal Google translate extension into your browser and it will translate from any language. Simples.
No, that's why everyone just uses Google.
Hi Jim, not sure if you’re looking for Amsterdam and Netherlands COVID-19 travel updates specifically, but this a good news sourcehttps://nltimes.nl/Edited: 10:06 am, June 16, 2020
If that's good news, I don't want to read any bad news :)
Either pay or disable adblocker. The pop-up ads were annoying to say the least."Not all those who wander are lost.” ― J.R.R. Tolkien

This seems to be the latest situation in English :https:/…traveltonlIn short, if you are from the UK or the US, forget it. If you are allowed into the Netherlands at all, you will have to do 14 days quarantine. Ironic, considering that both Trump and Johnson are boasting how well their country is doing.

>Ironic, considering that both Trump and Johnson are boasting how well their country is doing.<Yep. Kind of surprised about how they feel about the job they're doing."Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow-mindedness"--Mark TwainEdited: 6:48 pm, June 17, 2020
